title: muenstererOS
summary: A personal website for Dennis Muensterer (@dnnsmnstrr)
info:
The muenstererOS application is built with SvelteKit and hosted on Vercel.
Its design is inspired by operating systems like macOS, using shadcn-svelte components
to recreate elements like the menu bar, dock, draggable windows and a command bar / launcher.

Pages.title: Redirects
Pages.desc: A list of redirects to websites and accounts related to Dennis. Many of them have aliases that can be matched as fallbacks on the 404 page or queried via API (/api/redirects). For example `/ig` will redirect to `https://www.instagram.com/dnnsmnstrr/`, while `/instagram` or `/insta` will do the same.

Pages.title: Playlists
Pages.desc: Selection of Spotify playlists curated by Dennis. He has created a playlist for each season since 2017 and there are also various playlists for different themes, such as sleep, coding or workouts.

Pages.title: Now
Pages.desc: An overview of what Dennis is currently doing, updated semi-regularly.

Pages.title: Uses
Pages.desc: The current tech and gadget stack being used by Dennis. It can be filtered by hardware/software and other tags.

API.title: /api/redirects
API.desc: A list of redirects with a name, optional description, url and a list of aliases. All of type string (or string array)

API.title: /api/playlists
API.desc: Playlist-Objects include a title, an emoji, year and uri. They can be of type season or theme, with the former including a season field with either spring, summer, autumn or winter. There is also an imageUrl and an optional gif link.

API.title: /api/now
API.desc: Now data is pulled from a GitHub gist

API.title: /api/dennis
API.desc: Stats such as age, height, weight and contact information

API.title: /api/resume
API.desc: Data source for a CV in [JSON Resume](https://jsonresume.org/) format. The resulting website is available at [cv.muensterer.tech](https://cv.muensterer.tech)
